synopsis.text: Yuuyu, Raika, and Touya, champions of Japan's Deluxe cardfighting tournament, travel to America for exhibition matches after their victory. There, Danji investigates the tournament organizers on suspicion of foul play against missing fighters. Back in Japan, a mysterious group emerges seeking the "Ultimate Fight." They begin recruiting fighters for an unknown purpose that soon threatens Yuuyu and Blackout's future. In America, Raika's opponent hides a secret. Danji surprises Yuuyu by being his next opponent. They realize the tournament organizers harbor sinister secrets about disappearing duelists. As Yuuyu's team learns more, Michiru and Urara in Japan become entangled with forces plotting to upend the Vanguard world.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
